59 template <typename TR, typename Op, typename T1, typename... Ts,
60  typename std::enable_if<
61  is_tensor<TR, T1, Ts...>::value ||
62  is_tensor_of_tensor<TR, T1, Ts...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
63 inline TR tensor_op(Op&& op, const T1& tensor1, const Ts&... tensors) {
64  return TiledArray::detail::transform<TR>()(std::forward<Op>(op), tensor1,
65  tensors...);
66 }

81 template <typename TR, typename Op, typename T1, typename... Ts,
82  typename std::enable_if<
83  (is_tensor<T1, Ts...>::value ||
84  is_tensor_of_tensor<TR, T1, Ts...>::value) &&
85  is_contiguous_tensor<T1, Ts...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
86 inline TR tensor_op(Op&& op, const Permutation& perm, const T1& tensor1,
87  const Ts&... tensors) {
88  return TiledArray::detail::transform<TR>()(std::forward<Op>(op), perm,
89  tensor1, tensors...);
90 }
91 
94 template <typename T>
95 struct transform {
98  template <typename Op, typename Tensor, typename... Tensors>
99  T operator()(Op&& op, Tensor&& tensor, Tensors&&... tensors) const {
100  TA_ASSERT(!empty(tensor, tensors...));
101  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(tensor, tensors...));
102 
103  const auto& range = tensor.range();
104  T result(range);
105  this->operator()(result, std::forward<Op>(op), std::forward<Tensor>(tensor),
106  std::forward<Tensors>(tensors)...);
107  return result;
108  }
109 
112  template <typename Op, typename Tensor, typename... Tensors>
113  void operator()(T& result, Op&& op, Tensor&& tensor,
114  Tensors&&... tensors) const {
115  TA_ASSERT(!empty(result, tensor, tensors...));
116  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(result, tensor, tensors...));
117 
118  const auto& range = result.range();
119  for (auto&& i : range)
120  result[std::forward<decltype(i)>(i)] = std::forward<Op>(op)(
121  std::forward<Tensor>(tensor)[std::forward<decltype(i)>(i)],
122  std::forward<Tensors>(tensors)[std::forward<decltype(i)>(i)]...);
123  }
124 
125  template <typename Op, typename Tensor, typename... Tensors>
126  T operator()(Op&& op, const Permutation& perm, Tensor&& tensor,
127  Tensors&&... tensors) const {
128  TA_ASSERT(!empty(tensor, tensors...));
129  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(tensor, tensors...));
130  TA_ASSERT(perm);
131  TA_ASSERT(perm.dim() == tensor.range().rank());
132 
133  const auto& range = tensor.range();
134  T result(perm ^ range);
135  this->operator()(result, std::forward<Op>(op), perm,
136  std::forward<Tensor>(tensor),
137  std::forward<Tensors>(tensors)...);
138  return result;
139  }
140 
141  template <typename Op, typename Tensor, typename... Tensors>
142  void operator()(T& result, Op&& op, const Permutation& perm, Tensor&& tensor,
143  Tensors&&... tensors) const {
144  TA_ASSERT(!empty(result, tensor, tensors...));
145  TA_ASSERT(is_range_congruent(result, tensor, perm));
146  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(tensor, tensors...));
147  TA_ASSERT(perm);
148  TA_ASSERT(perm.dim() == tensor.range().rank());
149 
150  const auto& range = tensor.range();
151  for (auto&& i : range)
152  result[perm ^ std::forward<decltype(i)>(i)] = std::forward<Op>(op)(
153  std::forward<Tensor>(tensor)[std::forward<decltype(i)>(i)],
154  std::forward<Tensors>(tensors)[std::forward<decltype(i)>(i)]...);
155  }
156 };
157 
158 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
159 // Tensor kernel operations with in-place memory operations

162 
171 template <typename Op, typename TR, typename... Ts,
172  typename std::enable_if<
173  is_tensor<TR, Ts...>::value &&
174  is_contiguous_tensor<TR, Ts...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
175 inline void inplace_tensor_op(Op&& op, TR& result, const Ts&... tensors) {
176  TA_ASSERT(!empty(result, tensors...));
177  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(result, tensors...));
178 
179  const auto volume = result.range().volume();
180 
181  math::inplace_vector_op(op, volume, result.data(), tensors.data()...);
182 }
183 
185 
194 template <typename Op, typename TR, typename... Ts,
195  typename std::enable_if<
196  is_tensor_of_tensor<TR, Ts...>::value &&
197  is_contiguous_tensor<TR, Ts...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
198 inline void inplace_tensor_op(Op&& op, TR& result, const Ts&... tensors) {
199  TA_ASSERT(!empty(result, tensors...));
200  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(result, tensors...));
201 
202  const auto volume = result.range().volume();
203 
204  for (decltype(result.range().volume()) i = 0ul; i < volume; ++i) {
205  inplace_tensor_op(op, result[i], tensors[i]...);
206  }
207 }

234 template <typename InputOp, typename OutputOp, typename TR, typename T1,
235  typename... Ts,
236  typename std::enable_if<
237  is_tensor<TR, T1, Ts...>::value &&
238  is_contiguous_tensor<TR, T1, Ts...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
239 inline void inplace_tensor_op(InputOp&& input_op, OutputOp&& output_op,
240  const Permutation& perm, TR& result,
241  const T1& tensor1, const Ts&... tensors) {
242  TA_ASSERT(!empty(result, tensor1, tensors...));
243  TA_ASSERT(is_range_congruent(result, tensor1, perm));
244  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(tensor1, tensors...));
245  TA_ASSERT(perm);
246  TA_ASSERT(perm.dim() == tensor1.range().rank());
247 
248  permute(input_op, output_op, result, perm, tensor1, tensors...);
249 }

252 
270 template <typename InputOp, typename OutputOp, typename TR, typename T1,
271  typename... Ts,
272  typename std::enable_if<
273  is_tensor_of_tensor<TR, T1, Ts...>::value &&
274  is_contiguous_tensor<TR, T1, Ts...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
275 inline void inplace_tensor_op(InputOp&& input_op, OutputOp&& output_op,
276  const Permutation& perm, TR& result,
277  const T1& tensor1, const Ts&... tensors) {
278  TA_ASSERT(!empty(result, tensor1, tensors...));
279  TA_ASSERT(is_range_congruent(result, tensor1, perm));
280  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(tensor1, tensors...));
281  TA_ASSERT(perm);
282  TA_ASSERT(perm.dim() == tensor1.range().rank());
283 
284  auto wrapper_input_op = [=](
285  typename T1::const_reference MADNESS_RESTRICT value1,
286  typename Ts::const_reference MADNESS_RESTRICT... values) ->
287  typename T1::value_type {
288  return tensor_op<TR::value_type>(input_op, value1, values...);
289  };
290 
291  auto wrapper_output_op =
292  [=](typename T1::pointer MADNESS_RESTRICT const result_value,
293  const typename TR::value_type value) {
294  inplace_tensor_op(output_op, *result_value, value);
295  };
296 
297  permute(wrapper_input_op, wrapper_output_op, result, perm, tensor1,
298  tensors...);
299 }
300 
302 
311 template <typename Op, typename TR, typename... Ts,
312  typename std::enable_if<
313  is_tensor<TR, Ts...>::value &&
314  !(is_contiguous_tensor<TR, Ts...>::value)>::type* = nullptr>
315 inline void inplace_tensor_op(Op&& op, TR& result, const Ts&... tensors) {
316  TA_ASSERT(!empty(result, tensors...));
317  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(result, tensors...));
318 
319  const auto stride = inner_size(result, tensors...);
320  const auto volume = result.range().volume();
321 
322  for (decltype(result.range().volume()) i = 0ul; i < volume; i += stride)
323  math::inplace_vector_op(op, stride,
324  result.data() + result.range().ordinal(i),
325  (tensors.data() + tensors.range().ordinal(i))...);
326 }
327 
329 
338 template <typename Op, typename TR, typename... Ts,
339  typename std::enable_if<
340  is_tensor_of_tensor<TR, Ts...>::value &&
341  !(is_contiguous_tensor<TR, Ts...>::value)>::type* = nullptr>
342 inline void inplace_tensor_op(Op&& op, TR& result, const Ts&... tensors) {
343  TA_ASSERT(!empty(result, tensors...));
344  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(result, tensors...));
345 
346  const auto stride = inner_size(result, tensors...);
347  const auto volume = result.range().volume();
348 
349  auto inplace_tensor_range =
350  [=](typename TR::pointer MADNESS_RESTRICT const result_data,
351  typename Ts::const_pointer MADNESS_RESTRICT const... tensors_data) {
352  for (decltype(result.range().volume()) i = 0ul; i < stride; ++i)
353  inplace_tensor_op(op, result_data[i], tensors_data[i]...);
354  };
355 
356  for (decltype(result.range().volume()) i = 0ul; i < volume; i += stride)
357  inplace_tensor_range(result.data() + result.range().ordinal(i),
358  (tensors.data() + tensors.range().ordinal(i))...);
359 }

361 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
362 // Tensor initialization functions for argument tensors with contiguous
363 // memory layout

366 
375 template <typename Op, typename TR, typename... Ts,
376  typename std::enable_if<
377  is_tensor<TR, Ts...>::value &&
378  is_contiguous_tensor<TR, Ts...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
379 inline void tensor_init(Op&& op, TR& result, const Ts&... tensors) {
380  TA_ASSERT(!empty(result, tensors...));
381  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(result, tensors...));
382 
383  const auto volume = result.range().volume();
384 
385  auto wrapper_op = [=](typename TR::pointer MADNESS_RESTRICT result,
386  typename Ts::const_reference MADNESS_RESTRICT... ts) {
387  new (result) typename TR::value_type(op(ts...));
388  };
389 
390  math::vector_ptr_op(wrapper_op, volume, result.data(), tensors.data()...);
391 }
392 
394 
403 template <typename Op, typename TR, typename... Ts,
404  typename std::enable_if<
405  is_tensor_of_tensor<TR, Ts...>::value &&
406  is_contiguous_tensor<TR, Ts...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
407 inline void tensor_init(Op&& op, TR& result, const Ts&... tensors) {
408  TA_ASSERT(!empty(result, tensors...));
409  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(result, tensors...));
410 
411  const auto volume = result.range().volume();
412 
413  for (decltype(result.range().volume()) i = 0ul; i < volume; ++i) {
414  new (result.data() + i) typename TR::value_type(
415  tensor_op<typename TR::value_type>(op, tensors[i]...));
416  }
417 }

430 template <typename Op, typename TR, typename T1, typename... Ts,
431  typename std::enable_if<
432  is_tensor<TR, T1, Ts...>::value &&
433  is_contiguous_tensor<TR, T1, Ts...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
434 inline void tensor_init(Op&& op, const Permutation& perm, TR& result,
435  const T1& tensor1, const Ts&... tensors) {
436  TA_ASSERT(!empty(result, tensor1, tensors...));
437  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(perm, result, tensor1, tensors...));
438  TA_ASSERT(perm);
439  TA_ASSERT(perm.dim() == result.range().rank());
440 
441  auto output_op = [=](typename TR::pointer MADNESS_RESTRICT result,
442  typename TR::const_reference MADNESS_RESTRICT temp) {
443  new (result) typename TR::value_type(temp);
444  };
445 
446  permute(op, output_op, result, perm, tensor1, tensors...);
447 }

450 
460 template <typename Op, typename TR, typename T1, typename... Ts,
461  typename std::enable_if<
462  is_tensor_of_tensor<TR, T1, Ts...>::value &&
463  is_contiguous_tensor<TR, T1, Ts...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
464 inline void tensor_init(Op&& op, const Permutation& perm, TR& result,
465  const T1& tensor1, const Ts&... tensors) {
466  TA_ASSERT(!empty(result, tensor1, tensors...));
467  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(perm, result, tensor1, tensors...));
468  TA_ASSERT(perm);
469  TA_ASSERT(perm.dim() == result.range().rank());
470 
471  auto output_op = [=](typename TR::pointer MADNESS_RESTRICT result,
472  typename TR::const_reference MADNESS_RESTRICT temp) {
473  new (result) typename TR::value_type(temp);
474  };
475  auto tensor_input_op = [=](
476  typename T1::const_reference MADNESS_RESTRICT value1,
477  typename Ts::const_reference MADNESS_RESTRICT... values) ->
478  typename TR::value_type {
479  return tensor_op<typename TR::value_type>(op, value1, values...);
480  };
481 
482  permute(tensor_input_op, output_op, result, perm, tensor1, tensors...);
483 }
484 
486 
494 template <
495  typename Op, typename TR, typename T1, typename... Ts,
496  typename std::enable_if<
497  is_tensor<TR, T1, Ts...>::value && is_contiguous_tensor<TR>::value &&
498  !is_contiguous_tensor<T1, Ts...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
499 inline void tensor_init(Op&& op, TR& result, const T1& tensor1,
500  const Ts&... tensors) {
501  TA_ASSERT(!empty(result, tensor1, tensors...));
502  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(result, tensor1, tensors...));
503 
504  const auto stride = inner_size(tensor1, tensors...);
505  const auto volume = tensor1.range().volume();
506 
507  auto wrapper_op = [=](typename TR::pointer MADNESS_RESTRICT result_ptr,
508  const typename T1::value_type value1,
509  const typename Ts::value_type... values) {
510  new (result_ptr) typename T1::value_type(op(value1, values...));
511  };
512 
513  for (decltype(tensor1.range().volume()) i = 0ul; i < volume; i += stride)
514  math::vector_ptr_op(wrapper_op, stride, result.data() + i,
515  (tensor1.data() + tensor1.range().ordinal(i)),
516  (tensors.data() + tensors.range().ordinal(i))...);
517 }
518 
520 
528 template <typename Op, typename TR, typename T1, typename... Ts,
529  typename std::enable_if<
530  is_tensor_of_tensor<TR, T1, Ts...>::value &&
531  is_contiguous_tensor<TR>::value &&
532  !is_contiguous_tensor<T1, Ts...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
533 inline void tensor_init(Op&& op, TR& result, const T1& tensor1,
534  const Ts&... tensors) {
535  TA_ASSERT(!empty(result, tensor1, tensors...));
536  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(result, tensor1, tensors...));
537 
538  const auto stride = inner_size(tensor1, tensors...);
539  const auto volume = tensor1.range().volume();
540 
541  auto inplace_tensor_range =
542  [=](typename TR::pointer MADNESS_RESTRICT const result_data,
543  typename T1::const_pointer MADNESS_RESTRICT const tensor1_data,
544  typename Ts::const_pointer MADNESS_RESTRICT const... tensors_data) {
545  for (decltype(result.range().volume()) i = 0ul; i < stride; ++i)
546  new (result_data + i)
547  typename TR::value_type(tensor_op<typename TR::value_type>(
548  op, tensor1_data[i], tensors_data[i]...));
549  };
550 
551  for (decltype(volume) i = 0ul; i < volume; i += stride)
552  inplace_tensor_range(result.data() + i,
553  (tensor1.data() + tensor1.range().ordinal(i)),
554  (tensors.data() + tensors.range().ordinal(i))...);
555 }

557 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
558 // Reduction kernels for argument tensors
559 
561 
575 template <
576  typename ReduceOp, typename JoinOp, typename Scalar, typename T1,
577  typename... Ts,
578  typename std::enable_if_t<
579  is_tensor<T1, Ts...>::value && is_contiguous_tensor<T1, Ts...>::value &&
580  !is_reduce_op_v<std::decay_t<ReduceOp>, std::decay_t<Scalar>,
581  std::decay_t<T1>, std::decay_t<Ts>...>>* = nullptr>
582 Scalar tensor_reduce(ReduceOp&& reduce_op, JoinOp&& join_op, Scalar identity,
583  const T1& tensor1, const Ts&... tensors) {
584  TA_ASSERT(!empty(tensor1, tensors...));
585  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(tensor1, tensors...));
586 
587  const auto volume = tensor1.range().volume();
588 
589  math::reduce_op(reduce_op, join_op, identity, volume, identity,
590  tensor1.data(), tensors.data()...);
591 
592  return identity;
593 }
594 
596 
610 template <
611  typename ReduceOp, typename JoinOp, typename Scalar, typename T1,
612  typename... Ts,
613  typename std::enable_if_t<
614  is_tensor<T1, Ts...>::value && is_contiguous_tensor<T1, Ts...>::value &&
615  is_reduce_op_v<std::decay_t<ReduceOp>, std::decay_t<Scalar>,
616  std::decay_t<T1>, std::decay_t<Ts>...>>* = nullptr>
617 Scalar tensor_reduce(ReduceOp&& reduce_op, JoinOp&& join_op, Scalar identity,
618  const T1& tensor1, const Ts&... tensors) {
619  reduce_op(identity, &tensor1, &tensors...);
620  return identity;
621 }
622 
624 
641 template <typename ReduceOp, typename JoinOp, typename Scalar, typename T1,
642  typename... Ts,
643  typename std::enable_if<
644  is_tensor_of_tensor<T1, Ts...>::value &&
645  is_contiguous_tensor<T1, Ts...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
646 Scalar tensor_reduce(ReduceOp&& reduce_op, JoinOp&& join_op, Scalar identity,
647  const T1& tensor1, const Ts&... tensors) {
648  TA_ASSERT(!empty(tensor1, tensors...));
649  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(tensor1, tensors...));
650 
651  const auto volume = tensor1.range().volume();
652 
653  auto result = identity;
654  for (decltype(tensor1.range().volume()) i = 0ul; i < volume; ++i) {
655  auto temp =
656  tensor_reduce(reduce_op, join_op, identity, tensor1[i], tensors[i]...);
657  join_op(result, temp);
658  }
659 
660  return result;
661 }
662 
664 
681 template <typename ReduceOp, typename JoinOp, typename Scalar, typename T1,
682  typename... Ts,
683  typename std::enable_if<
684  is_tensor<T1, Ts...>::value &&
685  !is_contiguous_tensor<T1, Ts...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
686 Scalar tensor_reduce(ReduceOp&& reduce_op, JoinOp&& join_op,
687  const Scalar identity, const T1& tensor1,
688  const Ts&... tensors) {
689  TA_ASSERT(!empty(tensor1, tensors...));
690  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(tensor1, tensors...));
691 
692  const auto stride = inner_size(tensor1, tensors...);
693  const auto volume = tensor1.range().volume();
694 
695  Scalar result = identity;
696  for (decltype(tensor1.range().volume()) i = 0ul; i < volume; i += stride) {
697  Scalar temp = identity;
698  math::reduce_op(reduce_op, join_op, identity, stride, temp,
699  tensor1.data() + tensor1.range().ordinal(i),
700  (tensors.data() + tensors.range().ordinal(i))...);
701  join_op(result, temp);
702  }
703 
704  return result;
705 }
706 
708 
725 template <typename ReduceOp, typename JoinOp, typename Scalar, typename T1,
726  typename... Ts,
727  typename std::enable_if<
728  is_tensor_of_tensor<T1, Ts...>::value &&
729  !is_contiguous_tensor<T1, Ts...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
730 Scalar tensor_reduce(ReduceOp&& reduce_op, JoinOp&& join_op,
731  const Scalar identity, const T1& tensor1,
732  const Ts&... tensors) {
733  TA_ASSERT(!empty(tensor1, tensors...));
734  TA_ASSERT(is_range_set_congruent(tensor1, tensors...));
735 
736  const auto stride = inner_size(tensor1, tensors...);
737  const auto volume = tensor1.range().volume();
738 
739  auto tensor_reduce_range =
740  [=](Scalar& MADNESS_RESTRICT result,
741  typename T1::const_pointer MADNESS_RESTRICT const tensor1_data,
742  typename Ts::const_pointer MADNESS_RESTRICT const... tensors_data) {
743  for (decltype(result.range().volume()) i = 0ul; i < stride; ++i) {
744  Scalar temp = tensor_reduce(reduce_op, join_op, identity,
745  tensor1_data[i], tensors_data[i]...);
746  join_op(result, temp);
747  }
748  };
749 
750  Scalar result = identity;
751  for (decltype(tensor1.range().volume()) i = 0ul; i < volume; i += stride) {
752  Scalar temp =
753  tensor_reduce_range(result, tensor1.data() + tensor1.range().ordinal(i),
754  (tensors.data() + tensors.range().ordinal(i))...);
755  join_op(result, temp);
756  }
757 
758  return identity;
759 }
